de.esoco.lib.net

Class HostAuthenticator

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.net.Authenticator
      • de.esoco.lib.net.HostAuthenticator

  • public class HostAuthenticator
extends java.net.Authenticator
    Host-based Authenticator implementation that returns passwords based on the address of the requesting host.

    • Nested Class Summary

      • Nested classes/interfaces inherited from class java.net.Authenticator

        java.net.Authenticator.RequestorType

      Adds an authentication for a certain host.
      static void enable()
      Enables host-based authentication by registering an instance of this class by means of the Authenticator.setDefault(Authenticator) method.

      Returns the password authentication for the current requesting host.

      • addAuthentication

        public static void addAuthentication(java.lang.String sHost,
                                     java.net.PasswordAuthentication rAuth)
        Adds a password authentication for a certain host.
        Parameters:
        sHost - The host to set the authentication for
        rAuth - The password authentication object

      • addAuthentication

        public static void addAuthentication(java.lang.String sHost,
                                     java.lang.String sUser,
                                     java.lang.String sPassword)
        Adds an authentication for a certain host. For higher security please use the addAuthentication(String, PasswordAuthentication) method.
        Parameters:
        sHost - The host to set the authentication for
        sUser - The user name
        sPassword - The password

      • enable

        public static void enable()
        Enables host-based authentication by registering an instance of this class by means of the Authenticator.setDefault(Authenticator) method.

        Returns the password authentication for the current requesting host.
